original_text: A person with this disease must tear his clothes. He must not comb his hair. He must cover the lower part of his face. He must shout, “I am not clean.”
korean_text: 나병 환자는 옷을 찢고 머리를 풀며 윗입술을 가리고 외치기를 부정하다 부정하다 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: A person with this disease must tear his clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 이 질병을 가진 사람은 자신의 옷을 찢어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He must not comb his hair
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 머리를 빗지 않아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He must cover the lower part of his face
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 얼굴 아랫부분을 가려야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He must shout, "I am not clean"
